mapper.select: SELECT CD.SITE,CD.SEQUENCE,CD.CUSTOM_DATA_TYPE,CD.CD_FIELD,CD.CD_LABEL, CD.IS_DATA_REQUIRED,CDV.ATTRIBUTE,CDV.VALS FROM M_CUSTOM_DATA CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BO,CUSTOM_DATA_BO,ATTRIBUTE,VALS FROM M_CUSTOM_DATA_VAL WHERE BO=#{bo} ) CDV ON CD.BO = CDV.CUSTOM_DATA_BO WHERE CD.CUSTOM_DATA_TYPE=#{dataType} AND CD.SITE=#{site} ORDER BY CD.SEQUENCE ASC

SELECT CD.CD_FIELD, CD.CD_LABEL, CD.SEQUENCE, CDV.VALS FROM M_CUSTOM_DATA CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT BO, CUSTOM_DATA_BO, ATTRIBUTE, VALS FROM M_CUSTOM_DATA_VAL WHERE BO=#{bo}) CDV ON CD.BO = CDV.CUSTOM_DATA_BO WHERE CD.CUSTOM_DATA_TYPE = #{dataType} AND CD.SITE=#{site} ORDER BY CD.SEQUENCE ASC

SELECT CD.SITE,CD.SEQUENCE,CD.CUSTOM_DATA_TYPE,CD.CD_FIELD,CD.CD_LABEL, CD.IS_DATA_REQUIRED,CDV.ATTRIBUTE,CDV.VALS FROM M_CUSTOM_DATA CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BO,CUSTOM_DATA_BO,ATTRIBUTE,VALS FROM M_CUSTOM_DATA_VAL WHERE BO=#{bo} ) CDV ON CD.BO = CDV.CUSTOM_DATA_BO WHERE CD.CUSTOM_DATA_TYPE=#{dataType} AND CD.SITE=#{site} AND CD_FIELD='OPERATION_INSPECTION_NOT_REQUIRDE' ORDER BY CD.SEQUENCE ASC
